parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.20

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes user added action with given id index. This only removes actions added with the [[addAction]] command. You cannot remove default game actions, such as reload.

This command has [[local]] effect. The action will only be removed on the computer that executes the command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''removeAction''' index

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - unit, vehicle or static object
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] - action id returned by [[addAction]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[removeAction]] 0;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[actionIDs]], [[actionParams]], [[addAction]], [[setUserActionText]], [[inGameUISetEventHandler]], [[showHUD]], [[inputAction]], [[removeAllActions]], [[action]]
</value></part></template>



[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
